meanings.sent2: She was born in a small town.
meanings.sent3: The idea was born during a brainstorming session.
meanings.sent4: His passion for music was born out of a childhood memory.
meanings.sent5: The new project was born from a need for innovation.

meanings.definition: having a natural ability or quality
meanings.sent1: She is a born leader among her friends.
meanings.sent2: The artist is a born talent in painting.
meanings.sent3: His born sense of humor always lightens the mood.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's born speed makes him unbeatable.
meanings.sent5: The born creativity of the writer shines in every story.

meanings.definition: having a particular nationality or background
meanings.sent1: He is born in France and speaks French fluently.
meanings.sent2: She is born to a family of musicians.
meanings.sent3: The born Italian chef makes the best pasta in town.
meanings.sent4: The born American citizen celebrates Independence Day.
meanings.sent5: The born Chinese artist incorporates traditional elements in her work.
